Type: tuple number targeted by the lock within the page, or null if the target is not a tuple

Name: virtualxid
Description: virtual id of the transaction targeted by the lock, or null if the target is not a virtual transaction id

Name: transactionid
Description: id of the transaction targeted by the lock, or null if the target is not a transaction id

Name: classid
Description: oid of the system catalog containing the lock target, or null if the target is not a general database object

Name: objid
Description: oid of the lock target within its system catalog, or null if the target is not a general database object

Name: objsubid
Description: column number targeted by the lock (the classid and objid refer to the table itself), or zero if the target is some other general database object, or null if the target is not a general database object

Name: virtualtransaction
Description: virtual id of the transaction that is holding or awaiting this lock

Name: pid
Description: process id of the server process holding or awaiting this lock, or null if the lock is held by a prepared transaction

Name: mode
Description: name of the lock mode held or desired by this process

Name: granted
Description: true if lock is held, false if lock is awaited

Name: fastpath
Description: true if lock was taken via fast path, false if taken via main lock table
